text: @United flight was delayed for 3 hours, worst experience ever
Loved the service on @Delta, crew was super friendly!
@AmericanAir lost my luggage again, so disappointed
Smooth boarding and on-time arrival. Great job @SouthwestAir
The seats were uncomfortable but staff was polite
@JetBlue flight attendants were rude, not flying again
Got a free upgrade to business class, thank you @United!
Average flight, nothing special to mention
@DeltaAirLines provided excellent support with my booking
The in-flight entertainment was not working
Snacks were good but the legroom was terrible
@SouthwestAir always makes flying fun!
Check-in process was quick and easy
Customer service kept me on hold for 40 minutes
Flight was okay, staff were fine, nothing to complain
Super smooth landing, kudos to the pilot
I missed my connection because of their delay
@AmericanAir helped me rebook my flight quickly
Cabin was clean and comfortable
They refused to change my seat, very unhelpful
Just an ordinary flight, everything was normal
Loved the new in-flight menu options
Baggage claim took forever
Polite crew but very noisy cabin
@UnitedAirlines app kept crashing during check-in
Had extra legroom and free snacks, amazing!
Boarding was chaotic and disorganized
Comfortable seats and great WiFi on board
Staff did their best despite the delay
Worst airline experience in years
